concept.title: Event Registration Home Page
concept.abstract: Staff users can configure the attributes of an event and it's related objects to present the details in the Community Portal.

conbody.p:
Staff user configurations allow the portal user to navigate to view all related details of an event on the Event Registration Home page, such as the Event Name and Description. Both the Event Name and Description fields are populated through the Display Name and Description fields, respectively, on the Event Detail page. The full range of details available for portal viewing include:
Banner Image-Configured on the Event Detail page via the Image URL field.
Social Media Channels-
Event Totals-
Venue Info-Configured on the Event Detail page via the Venue/Location and Location Information fields.
Date Info-Configured on the Event Detail page via the Start Date/Time and End Date/Time fields.

Additionally, tabular navigation on the Event Registration Home page provides portal users with the functionality to view different elements of the event via:
Overview Tab-Displays as the Event Registration Home page and opens by default.
Agenda Tab-
Speakers Tab-
Sponsors Tab-
Exhibitors Tab-
